pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Max Scherzer; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .192 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .238 off him after that.
Max Scherzer really has his changeup working; he's allowing a .234 average against it this season and Rangers hitters are 1-for-5 against it in this game.
